name: HC_PLACE_OF_SRVC
description: This table contains home care place of service information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the level of care changes for a hospice patient

columns.name: HOME_CARE_POS_DT
columns.description: This item tracks a starting date for the place of service of a home care patient.

columns.name: PLACE_OF_SERVICE_ID
columns.description: EAF ID of the place of service for a home care episode.

columns.name: POS_ADDRESS
columns.description: Street address of the home care place of service

columns.name: POS_CITY
columns.description: This item tracks the city of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the state of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_ZIP
columns.description: This item tracks the zip code of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the type of location for a home care patient's place of service.
entries: Intermediate Care Facility/ Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities
Telehealth - Provided Other than in Patient's Home

columns.name: POS_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item tracks free text comments about the place of service and/or hospice level of care.

columns.name: POS_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the user who last edited this line of the place of service or level of care.

columns.name: POS_EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: POS_EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: This item tracks the instant at which this place of service entry was last edited.

columns.name: HSPC_ROOM_BOARD_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether or not room and board charges should be generated for this place of service entry.

columns.name: POS_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the department for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: POS_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the county of the home care patient's place of service

columns.name: POS_COUNTRY_2_C_NAME
columns.description: This column tracks the country category value for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: POS_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: This column tracks the house number for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: POS_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column tracks the district category value for a home care patient's place of service.

columns.name: LATITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded latitude of the place of service address in decimal degrees with up to 6 decimals of accuracy.

columns.name: LONGITUDE
columns.description: The geocoded longitude for the place of service address with 6 decimals of precision.

columns.name: GEO_RATING
columns.description: The GEO_RATING rates the accuracy of latitude and longitude for a given place of service address.
